title: Cannot connect to the game
body:
Hello,

There is something strange going on.
After champion select, when the game should start loading, I got an error "Cannot connect, check your internet connection", but when I restarted air client, which didn't had internet connection problems, I still got that message when reconnecting game. After 5 minutes I was able to connect, but had my team wait for me. There is something going on with the server.

Here is the link to the match, which I had problems with, if it helps - http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/99318538?tab=overview
